member.summary: Uses textContent attribute of component scope element.

member.summary: Uses innerHTML attribute of component scope element.

member.name: F:Atata.ContentSource.Value
member.summary: Uses value attribute of component scope element.

member.name: F:Atata.ContentSource.ChildTextNodes
member.summary: Uses the concatenation of child nested text values. Executes the script that gets childNodes of component scope element, filters only Node.TEXT_NODE and concatenates the textContent values of these nodes.

member.name: F:Atata.ContentSource.ChildTextNodesTrimmed
member.summary: Uses the concatenation of child nested text values trimming each text. Executes the script that gets childNodes of component scope element, filters only Node.TEXT_NODE, gets textContent of each node, trims each value and concatenates them.

member.name: F:Atata.ContentSource.ChildTextNodesTrimmedAndSpaceJoined
member.summary: Uses the concatenation of child nested text values trimming each text part and joining with " " separator. Executes the script that gets childNodes of component scope element, filters only Node.TEXT_NODE, gets textContent of each node, trims each value and concatenates them delimiting with " " character.

member.name: F:Atata.ContentSource.FirstChildTextNode
member.summary: Uses the first child nested text value. Executes the script that gets childNodes of component scope element, finds the first Node.TEXT_NODE and returns the textContent value of this node. Returns an empty string if there are no text nodes.

member.name: F:Atata.ContentSource.LastChildTextNode
member.summary: Uses the last child nested text value. Executes the script that gets childNodes of component scope element, finds the last Node.TEXT_NODE and returns the textContent value of this node. Returns an empty string if there are no text nodes.

member.name: M:Atata.AtataContextBuilder.AddScreenshotFileSaving
member.summary: Adds the instance for the screenshot saving to file. By default uses "Logs\{build-start}\{test-name-sanitized}" as folder path format, "{screenshot-number:D2} - {screenshot-pageobjectfullname}{screenshot-title: - *}" as file name format and as image format. Example of screenshot file path using default settings: "Logs\2018-03-03 14_34_04\SampleTest\01 - Home page - Screenshot title.png". Available path variables: {build-start}, {test-name}, {test-name-sanitized}, {test-start}, {driver-alias}, {screenshot-number}, {screenshot-title}, {screenshot-pageobjectname}, {screenshot-pageobjecttypename}, {screenshot-pageobjectfullname}. Path variables support the formatting.

member.summary: Specifies the host name of the service. The default value is "localhost". This configuration option makes sense for .NET Core 2.0 to be set to "127.0.0.1" for IPv4 and "[::1]" for IPv6. There is a bug (https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/24104) in .NET Core 2.0: each WebDriver request takes extra 1 second.

member.name: M:Atata.DriverAtataContextBuilder`3.WithFixOfCommandExecutionDelay
member.summary: Specifies that the fix of driver's HTTP command execution delay should be applied. Invokes WithHostName("127.0.0.1") method. This configuration option makes sense for .NET Core 2.0 that works within IPv4. There is a bug (https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/24104) in .NET Core 2.0: each WebDriver request takes extra 1 second.
